source.description: Source meta data used for tracking and creating items correctly.

json.description: kebab-case title of your homebrew. This is used to differentiate your data from everything else and {@b must be unique}.

full.description: The full name of your homebrew, with correct casing.

abbreviation.description: The abbreviated name of your homebrew, used in reference tags and shown as the source. Use colons to separate title/subtitle. {@b Underscore characters are reserved for translation files.}

version.description: Version of your homebrew. You can use an actual versioning system, but I suggest using the most recent date it was updated.

language.description: The collection's language, spelled out. Defaults to English.

color.description: The hex-color of the abbreviation when displayed in tables and headers. Please make sure the color is readable in all color schemes. Defaults to black/white based on theme.

url.description: Web address of your homebrew. Can link to drivethrurpg, or any other website at which your product is located.

items.description: List of people who converted the collection from PDF/etc to GenesysRef JSON format.
List of people who translated the collection from a different language. Do not use this field if the source material was itself a translation.

releaseDate.description: Source release date. Please use the format: D Month YYYY (28 April 2023).

defaultItemSettings.description: Default settings for every item. Can be overridden by the item's optional "settings" property. If your collection has a mixture of different settings such as the EPG, leave this as an empty array.

settings.description: Unique settings used in this collection.

magicSkills.description: Unique magic skills used in this collection.

optionFeatureType.description: Unique option feature types used in this collection. Strings must be lowercase to filter properly.

optionFeatureClass.description: Unique option feature classes used in this collection. Strings must be lowercase to filter properly.
